import React from 'react' const AddPerson = (props) => { const schulungsleitIDs = props.schulungsleitIDs; const managerIDs = props.managerIDs; const gruppenIDs = props.gruppenIDs; const zahlungIDs = props.zahlungIDs; function renderSwitch(param) { switch(param) { case 'manager': return ( <>

); case 'lehrer': return ( <>

{(() => { if (props.userAdded === 1) { return ✓ User added } else if (props.userAdded === -1) { return ✗ User already exists; } else { return null; }})()}
)}; export default AddPerson;
